text: I ordered a Large Deep Dish or Pan Pizza.  The crust is exactly like a normal pizza and its the smallest large i have ever seen. Bummed. Never going here again.  Little Ceasars is better even  that's pretty sad

name: Jake Branderhorst
text: This Hut has been delivering to my place for months now. The pizza is top notch and the customer service is above and beyond. I've had drivers go out and get me soda when it wasn't brought initially of their own accord. This is my Pizza Hut and I'm proud of that.

name: Armando Burruel
text: The staff was courteous, the pizza was pretty good, and the service was pretty quick, all in all it was pretty good. I've been getting pizza from here for years and it's always the same, pretty good. Although I am not complaining because I know what to expect and I am okay with it.
